data.text:
@CherylZiola @CityNewsVAN I mean, free money vis-à-vis:
“Free” UBI.
“Free” dental care. 
“Free” prescription drugs. 
“Free” puppies. 
Except it ain’t FREE.

@CherylZiola @CityNewsVAN Trudeau already got their September, 2021 vote. By the time the next election rolls around, Trudeau and his Liberals will have bribed a whole new batch of voters, with our money.

@CityNewsVAN Again? Why now? I had to prove I was eligible to get it in the first place. 
I applied through service Canada. Wouldn’t they have had access to this information before handing out large sums of money?
@CityNewsVAN Finally! So much fraud at taxpayer expense! Good luck recovering any.
@CityNewsVAN Only criminals get to keep it.

@CityNewsVAN CRA should be held accountable for not checking peoples taxes before handing out this money, They have eveyones info right in front of them ,why was this not being checked first ??? We pay taxes for them to do the job properly and now they want to fixed it ,good luck
@CityNewsVAN Hahaha I knew this was going to happen! 🤣
@CityNewsVAN Hundreds of "homeless" and unemployables recipients applied for and received these benefits. How will the government deal with these? Pretty hard to get blood from a stone.
@CityNewsVAN I just had to pay back $2,000. Turns out they gave me too much back in the spring of 2020 😢
